resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104716</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104716</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206600</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">DNA Microarray</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">DNA Microarray</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ADN Microarray</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dna Microarray</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">DNA Microarray</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">DNA Microarray</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">DNA Microarray</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a virtual lab of a DNA microarray experiment. Compare samples of healthy tissue and cancerous tissue as a scientist would. Learn the basics about DNA and gene expression.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist ein virtuelles Labor eines DNA microarray 
Experimentes. Vergleichen Sie Proben des gesunden Gewebes und 
des cancerous Gewebes, wie ein Wissenschaftler wurde. Erlernen 
Sie die Grundlagen über DNA und Genausdruck.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un laboratoire virtuel d'une expérience 
microarray d'ADN. Comparez les échantillons de tissu sain et de
tissu cancéreux comme un scientifique . Apprenez les fondations
au sujet de l'expression d'ADN et de gène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um laboratório virtual de uma experiência 
microarray do DNA. Compare amostras do tecido saudável e do 
tecido cancerous como um cientista . Aprenda os princípios 
sobre a expressão do DNA e do gene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un laboratorio virtuale di un esperimento 
microarray del DNA. Confronti i campioni del tessuto sano e del 
tessuto cancerous come uno scienziato. Impari i principi 
fondamentali circa l'espressione del gene e del DNA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένα εικονικό εργαστήριο ενός microarray 
πειράματος DNA. Συγκρίνετε τα δείγματα του υγιούς ιστού 
και του καρκινώδους ιστού όπως ένας επιστήμονας. Μάθετε τα
βασικά για την έκφραση DNA και γονιδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es un laboratorio virtual de un experimento 
microarray de la DNA. Compare las muestras del tejido fino sano 
y del tejido fino canceroso como un científico . Aprenda los 
fundamentos sobre la expresión de la DNA y del gene.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206600</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104716</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/dna-microarray</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
